name: Organic
description: Our organic free-range eggs come from hens that live on free-range farms and fed only the finest organic (non-GMO) grains and seeds from certifide pesticide-free fields.

blocks.name: Organic
text: Our Organic Free-Range eggs come from hens that live on free-range farms and fed only the finest organic (non-GMO) grains & seeds from certified pesticide-free fields.
To ensure purity and quality, we mill our own feed onsite at Southern California’s only dedicated organic poultry feed mill. And we inspect each egg so we know it’s fit to wear our name.

blocks.heading: Better For Our Hens
blocks.subheading: Our pasture raised hens enjoy the outdoors and all the benefits that come with the freedom to roam wild and free.

blocks.heading: Better For Our Eggs
blocks.subheading: Natural pastures, plants and bugs - what else could be better for a hen? That's why pasture raised eggs are more flavorful and nutricious!

blocks.heading: Better For You
blocks.subheading: Happier hens make higher quality eggs to support a healthier you. It's that simple.

moreOptions.name: Organic Omega-3
moreOptions.description: Our Organic Omega-3 eggs come from hens raised in free roaming environments and fed a special organic diet that contains flax seed—a grain naturally high in Omega-3 fatty acids. Each egg contains 225 mg of Omega-3, also known as alpha-linoleic acid (ALA). ALA has been shown to have positive health effects in humans, especially for cardiovascular health.

moreOptions.name: ORGANIC OMEGA-3 SOY FREE
moreOptions.description: Our Organic Omega-3 eggs come from hens raised in free roaming environments and fed a special soy-free diet that contains flax seed—a grain naturally high in Omega-3 fatty acids. Each egg contains 225 mg of Omega-3, also known as alpha-linoleic acid (ALA). ALA has been shown to have positive health effects in humans, especially for cardiovascular health.
